summary:
This is the Mod which just recolours the Guard Armors, so that they suit to my Guard Shields Recoloured mod.
There are 2 versions: One which just replaces the colours and one which recoloures the armor AND adds logos of the holds to the armor.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Mod which just recolours the Guard Armors, so that they suit to my Guard Shields Recoloured mod.
There are 2 versions: One which just replaces the colours and one which recoloures the armor AND adds logos of the holds to the armor.

ATTENTION! The recoloured armors just look a bit comic-style. Check out the screenshots.
                   Don\'t write it in the comments, that it looks comic-style. I know that.

This mod is thought to use it, if you have my Guards Shields Mod.
Then, the colours suit very good.

Installation: NMM (It won\'t add a Plugin but it will work) or copy the textures-folder to the  
                   Skyrim\\Data-Directory
Deinstallation: Just delete all \"stormcloakscuirass******.dds\"-files in the Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\stormcloaks-Folder

Endorse it, if you like it!
Enjoy!
author: GGinddi
